GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object that matches the article_id

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by date in descending order

GET /api/articles/:articles/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id with most recent comments first

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object containing the comment that was inserted into the comments table

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the updated article that matches the article_id with it votes property adjusted
